amendment.description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for the Veterans Housing Benefit Program Fund for the development of improved informational materials regarding the relative benefits of a VA home loan versus other types of housing loans for different homebuyer profiles.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
